titleStmt.title: Honest, plain, down-right-dealing with the people called episcopal-men, & Presbyterians. In this seasonable advice given unto them, and their teachers.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, d. 1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Robert Wilson, and are to be sold at his shop at the Black-spread-Eagle and Wind-Mill in Martins L'Grand,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Geo. Fox the younger.
In this edition line 4 of text ends: know.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
